info.title: Autodesk Data Exchange
info.description: Unleash your productivity and streamline collaboration by connecting design and make data between Revit and the tools of your choice.

get.summary: Get details of a Data Exchange property (deprecated)
get.description: This operation gets details of a property associated with a Data Exchange (deprecated).

parameters.name: assetid
parameters.description: Property identifier for a property within the selected Data Exchange

get.summary: Get details of a Data Exchange property

parameters.name: assetid
parameters.description: Property identifier for a property within the selected Data Exchange

get.summary: Get details about a Data Exchange
get.description: This operation gets details about a Data Exchange such as its Autodesk Docs project name, author of the file, and the last modified time, etc.

get.summary: Get properties of a Data Exchange (deprecated)
get.description: This operation gets the properties of a Data Exchange. You can specify to get all the properties or only the latest properties (deprecated).

parameters.name: getlatest
parameters.description: Get all or latest properties for the selected Data Exchange

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination token for the next page of properties

get.description: Get All Properties for a given Exchange

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination token for the next page of properties

post.summary: When a Data Exchange is updated
post.description: This operation triggers a flow when a Data Exchange is updated.

post.summary: When a Data Exchange is created
post.description: This operation triggers a flow when a Data Exchange is created.

This operation gets the properties of objects of a Data Exchange. You can specify to get all the properties or only the latest properties.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination token for the next page of properties

get.summary: Get properties of objects by filter
get.description: This operation gets the properties of objects of a Data Exchange filtered by selection.

parameters.name: getlatest
parameters.description: Get all or latest properties for the selected Data Exchange

parameters.name: filterBy
parameters.description: Filter by Category, Family or Type

parameters.name: selectedUnitType
parameters.description: Unit Type for Length, Area and Volume properties

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination token for the next page of properties
